original: @59b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @59b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: m'a y'a dz'a la kra ma aa ba lo ki te shva ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: m'a y'a dz'a la kra ma aa ba lo ki te shva ra s'a dha nam /
translated: Mayajalakarmasadhanavalokitesvarasadhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pa'i spyan @60a * //üîΩras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pa'i spyan @60a * // ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs /
translated: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pa'i spyanüîΩras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokitesvara.

original: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i rjes su /
analyzed: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i rjes su /
translated: After meditating on emptiness by the rite taught previously,

original: nam mkha' la ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um de yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: nam mkha' la ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um de yongs su gyur pa las /
translated: in space, from ram arises a sun mandala, and upon that, from hum,

original: sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram /
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram /
translated: a crossed vajra arises.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i ra ba dang rdo rje'i gur yang ngo //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i ra ba dang rdo rje'i gur yang ngo //
translated: That completely transforms into a vajra fence and a vajra canopy.

original: de'i nang du mi bzad pa'i dur khrod rnam par bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de'i nang du mi bzad pa'i dur khrod rnam par bsgoms nas /
translated: In the middle of that, one should visualize an extremely terrifying charnel ground.

original: de'i dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa /
analyzed: de'i dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa /
translated: In the middle of that, an eight-petaled red lotus arises.

original: de'i dbus su hr'i: las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog nag po /
analyzed: de'i dbus su hr'i: las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog nag po /
translated: In the middle of that, from hri, arises the Bhagavat, the noble Avalokitesvara, black in color.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine him standing on the solar mandala with his left leg extended.

original: zhal lnga pa spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: zhal lnga pa spyan gsum pa /
translated: He has five faces and three eyes.

original: phyag bcu gnyis pa'o //üîΩdkar po dang dmar po ni /
analyzed: phyag bcu gnyis pa'o // dkar po dang dmar po ni /
translated: He has twelve arms.

original: g-yas kyi zhal gnyis so //
analyzed: g-yas kyi zhal gnyis so //
translated: The two right faces are white and red.

original: de bzhin du ser po dang / ljang gu ni g-yon gyi zhal gnyis so //
analyzed: de bzhin du ser po dang / ljang gu ni g-yon gyi zhal gnyis so //
translated: Similarly, the two left faces are yellow and green.

original: g-yas kyi phyag na rde'u chung dang / kha tv'am ga dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje dang mda' bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag na rde'u chung dang / kha tv'am ga dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje dang mda' bsnams pa'o //
translated: In his right hands he holds a vajra, arrow, goad, noose, vajra cross, and a club.

original: g-yon na sdigs mdzub dang / thod pa dang / padma dmar po dang / nor bu dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon na sdigs mdzub dang / thod pa dang / padma dmar po dang / nor bu dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu bsnams pa'o //
translated: In his left hands he holds a threatening forefinger, skull cup, red lotus, jewel, wheel, and bow.

original: zhal thams cad mche ba gtsigs pa /
analyzed: zhal thams cad mche ba gtsigs pa /
translated: All his faces have bared fangs.

original: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa /
translated: He has the six symbolic ornaments.

original: sku la mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
analyzed: sku la mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
translated: His body is adorned with a garland of fresh heads.

original: gcer bu g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: gcer bu g-yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis bzhugs pa /
translated: He is naked, standing with his left leg extended.

original: yan lag thams cad mdzes pa'i bdag nyid du skad cig gis rab tu brtags la /
